programmes.show_description: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which four players take on an extraordinary machine in the hope of winning a cash jackpot.
The Buzz in Buddies: A team of five quizzing friends attempt to top the Tenable Tower to win a big cash prize. Quiz show, hosted by Warwick Davis.

programmes.show_name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?
programmes.show_description: 15 questions are all that stand between six contestants and a life-changing jackpot of one million pounds.
Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which four players take on an extraordinary machine in the hope of winning the 10,000 pound jackpot.
